pr_title: Backport: HBASE-24273 HBCK's "Orphan Regions on FileSystem" reports regions wit…

timeline.message:
HBASE-24273 HBCK's "Orphan Regions on FileSystem" reports regions with referenced HFiles (#1613)

Signed-off-by: stack <stack@apache.org>

timeline.bodyText: nit: maybe call scanForMergedParentRegions() inside loadRegionsFromFs, for simplicity?
timeline.author: wchevreuil

replies.bodyText: Thanks @wchevreuil, this is good catch. I have pushed the patch as it is to master and branch-2.3, to keep it consistent, I will push as it is. Will put up an addendum if it is needed.
replies.author: huaxiangsun
